text: 42|12|vāṉaṅkaḷ, pūmiyiṉ (pokkiṣaṅkaḷiṉ) cāvikaḷ avaṉiṭamē irukkiṉṟaṉa. Avaṉ virumpiyavarkaḷukku uṇavai virivākkukiṟāṉ. (Avaṉ virumpiyavarkaḷukkuc) curukki viṭukiṟāṉ. Niccayamāka avaṉ cakala vastukkaḷaiyum (makkaḷiṉ taṉmaikaḷaiyum) naṉkaṟintavaṉ. (Ākavē, avarkaḷiṉ takutikkut takkavāṟu koṭukkiṟāṉ)
